text.section:
A person may not advertise, allow to be advertised, or call to public attention:
a drug, medicine, preparation, or substance for the treatment, alleviation, or cure of venereal disease; or
a person from whom or a place where a drug, medicine, preparation, or substance for the treatment, alleviation, or cure of venereal disease may be obtained.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $500 for each violation.
